content: {"name": "HOPE STREET FOOD PANTRY", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Hope Street Food Pantry is a community food pantry open to anyone in need. You can receive food from Hope Street once a week. **You do not need a referral, appointment, ID or financial documents to receive food.**\n\nGo to hopestreetfoodpantry.com for a list of all the Charlotte Mecklenburg Library branches we serve at every Tuesday 10am-noon. We're also open every Thursday 4-7pm at 4100 Johnston Oehler Road. ", "email": "", "url": "https://hopestreetfoodpantry.com", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "4100 Johnston Oehler Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Highland Creek", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28269", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.3657749, "longitude": -80.7738964}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 584-9073", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "20:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Open to all"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must have telephone number"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}]}
